Uses of Package
stepPackage

Classes in stepPackage used by stepPackage
AAAStepUp
          This is the main class (MIDlet) were the j2me application starts executing
DailyProgress
          This class is responsible of getting and setting the user daily progress.
DBmanger
          This the database manager class, it handles all database operations.
DeamonClient
          This class is responsible of contacting step up deamon.
HistoryView
          This class is responsible of getting and setting the user History view.
NewGroupView
          The class is responsibel of managing create or join a group view.
ProfileView
          This class is responsible of setting the user profile view.
ProgressListView
          This class is responsible of setting the progress list view.
StepOperation
          The class is responsible of managing steps operations.
StepReciver
          Handle communication with motionClassifier deamon.
StepsCanvas
          The class is responisble of drawing the step view.
StepsView
          Manage steps view which display number of steps , distance walked km,and calories burned.
TeamProgress
          The class is reponsible of managing team progress view
Watcher
          The class is responsible of commnunicating with Step Up watcher.
WeekProgress
          The class is responsibel of managing the weekly progress view.
